hero.title: Second Souffle opens the doors to visual creation
hero.description: Through our team's expertise, Second Souffle enables you to access a world of creative and technical opportunities without constraints.

about.title: About Second Souffle Production
about.description: Dive into our commitment to singularity, creativity, and social impact in the film industry

process.title: We are committed to supporting projects that align with our values

equalityCinema.title: Cinema of Equality
equalityCinema.description: We celebrate and promote equality in the film industry. Our commitment is reflected in supporting projects that fairly represent genders and ethnicities, creating a space where every talent can express themselves and share their unique voice.

esgCommitment.title: ESG Environmental Commitment
esgCommitment.description: We integrate environmental and social consciousness into every project we support. Our goal is to promote environmentally respectful and socially responsible production practices. We actively support the transition to more sustainable cinema.

artisticFreedom.title: Artistic Freedom and Thematic Uniqueness
artisticFreedom.description: Artistic freedom is at the heart of our mission. We encourage filmmakers to push creative boundaries and explore new ideas. Second Souffle Production is a fertile ground for diverse stories, offering audiences a rich variety of cinematic experiences.
